service.title: The PKCS #11 URI Scheme
service.documentation: This memo specifies a PKCS #11 Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Scheme for identifying PKCS #11 objects stored in PKCS #11 tokens and also for identifying PKCS #11 tokens, slots, or libraries. The URI scheme is based on how PKCS #11 objects, tokens, slots, and libraries are identified in "PKCS #11 v2.20: Cryptographic Token Interface Standard".

uri-scheme.documentation: The URI scheme defined in this document is designed specifically with a mapping to the PKCS #11 API in mind.
